promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a dynamic epic rabbit electric-type pokemon holding a yellow and black bow. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltabun, a a dynamic epic rabbit electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Magnetic Bolt, Grand Echo-GX. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "electric" or "Voltabun". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, rabbit-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This nimble thunder-hare thrives in stormy habitats, using Magnetic Bolt to glide effortlessly and unleashing Grand Echo-GX to outwit foes.
